verses.name: Acts 10:23
verses.text: Then called he them in, and lodged them. And on the morrow Peter went away with them, and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him.

verses.name: Acts 10:24
verses.text: And the morrow after they entered into Cesarea. And Cornelius waited for them, and had called together his kinsmen and near friends.

verses.name: Acts 10:25
verses.text: And as Peter was coming in, Cornelius met him, and fell down at his feet, and worshipped him.

verses.name: Acts 10:26
verses.text: But Peter took him up, saying, Stand up; I myself also am a man.

verses.name: Acts 10:27
verses.text: And as he talked with him, he went in, and found many that were come together.
